name: João Maia
title: Full-Stack Developer
subtitle: Back-end operations, Azure, and OOP-focused problem solver
summary: Full-stack developer based in Porto, passionate about learning and creative problem-solving. Experienced across back-end operations, Microsoft Azure, and object-oriented development.
longSummary: Since 2010, I've been exploring programming methodologies, computer science, and network architectures. I work across IT consulting, multi-camera live streaming, and web development—with a strong focus on efficiency, automation, and reliable delivery.
